info.name: Convergence
info.description: HTTP API Calls for the Convergence Collaboration Framework. See https://convergence.io for more information on Convergence.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Logs the user in using a username and password. The response will include a session token that can be used to authenticate subsequent API calls.
Invalidates the current users Session Token.
Validates that a session token is still valid. The result will contain the authenticated user's username and the time interval in which the session token will expire.

item.description: API calls having to do with authenticating user to the Convergence Server.

item.name: Authenticated User
API Keys
item.description: API Calls dealing with a Convergence Users API Keys. API Keys allow third party systems to make API calls on behalf of the corresponding user.
API Calls that deal with information that relates to the currently authenticated user. These include the users profile, password, favorite domains, API Keys, etc.

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.
